channel.title: Order of Columns in Export does not match visualisation
channel.description:
The order of columns in our visualisations are not respected when we download to CSV/XLS.
Is it possible to set the column order for the downloads?

item.title: Order of Columns in Export does not match visualisation
item.dc:creator: angsm1th
item.description:
I found the answer to my own question in Unable to change the order of dataset columns - #4 by LeoRochael.

Read full topic
item.source: Order of Columns in Export does not match visualisation
